attributes.action: End 9 years of mental Torture of Gary Mckinnon #FREEGARY
attributes.additional_details:
We, the Undersigned call on Nick Clegg and David Cameron to keep their pre-election promise to stop the Extradition of Gary Mckinnon and to give his family their life back.
If Gary is to be tried- he should be tried at Home by a jury of his own peers.
All the details of Garys Case are in the Public domain and both of the current UK Leaders supported Gary's fight before they were elected.
The US Government via President Obama himself have said they will 'accept the decision of thE UK'.
WE SAY END IT NOW AND #FREEGARY
